backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, voice models, and voice conversion jobs with access control and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and tests with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose and behavior in the app.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file defining the Replicate API token variable.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Router and theme setup defining routes for models, creation, and jobs inside the main layout.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout component providing navigation, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with links, icons, active-state styling, and login button.
frontend/src/components/AudioUploadAndSu: Handles selecting a model and audio file, uploading the audio, tracking progress, and creating a conversion job.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wraps content with an authentication check, showing a login prompt or loading state when needed.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the app’s brand logo image.
frontend/src/components/EmptyStateHero.t: Displays a centered empty‑state message with optional image and action button.
frontend/src/components/InlineAlert.tsx: Shows an inline alert with icons and variants for status or error messages.
frontend/src/components/JobsTable.tsx: Fetches and lists conversion jobs sorted by creation time using JobStatusCard.
frontend/src/components/JobStatusCard.ts: Displays a conversion job’s status with playback and download controls and handles audio preview logic.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides login/logout button behavior using Internet Identity with loading states.
frontend/src/components/ModelSelect.tsx: Fetches available voice models and renders a dropdown for selecting one.
Displays a list of user voice models with delete confirmation and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/VoiceModelUpload: Handles uploading a new voice model file with metadata, progress tracking, and form reset.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversionJobs.ts: Provides hooks to fetch conversion jobs, get a single job, and create new conversion jobs with progress handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context for authentication, storing identity state and login/logout logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useModelNameLookup.ts: Returns a function that maps model IDs to their names using fetched voice models.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceModels.ts: Fetches, uploads, and deletes voice models with react-query and backend actor integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CreateCoverPage.tsx: Redirects users without models and provides an interface to upload audio and create AI covers.
frontend/src/pages/JobsHistoryPage.tsx: Shows the user’s conversion job history or an empty state, using authentication gating.
frontend/src/pages/VoiceModelsPage.tsx: Displays voice model upload form, list of models, or empty state depending on data.
frontend/src/services/voiceConversion.ts: Handles client-side voice conversion via Replicate, including data URL preparation, prediction polling, and downloading converted audio.
frontend/src/utils/actorErrorMessage.ts: Parses backend and agent errors to extract a clean, user-readable message.
Downloads an ExternalBlob by fetching its bytes, creating an object URL, and triggering a file download.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Reads a File into a Uint8Array with size validation and FileReader handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, issues, and feature requirements for rebuilding reliable voice conversion and playback.
